alert.note: Alert for Irwin (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 2:36PM EDT until May 06 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN IRWIN COUNTY... At 235 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ambrose, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Irwin County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for south central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
